item.title: Playing around with geo mapping: combining demographic data with spatial data
item.description: In this post, we will play around with some basic geo mapping. More preciseyl, we will explore some easy ways to plot a choropleth map. First, let’s load some geo data (Bundeswahlleiter, 2017), and combine it with some socio demographic data from the same source (Bundeswahlleiter, 2017). item.title: Error bars for interaction effects with nominal variables
item.description: Moderator effects (ie., interaction or synergy effects) are a topic of frequent interest in many sciences braches. A lot ink has been spilled over this topic (so did I, eg., here). However, in that post I did now show how to visualize error in case of nominal (categorical) independent variable, and categorical moderator.
